description: Try our easy to follow Madeline's Finger-Lickin' Ribs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Madeline's Finger-Lickin' Ribs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 orange, rind cut into 2 strips (8 x 2cm)

recipeInstructions.text: Blanch ribs in a saucepan of boiling water for 3 minutes. Drain and pat dry with paper towel, then season.
Heat the oil in a frying pan over medium-high heat. Add ribs and cook for 2-3 minutes each side until lightly browned. Add ginger and garlic and cook, stirring, for 1-2 minutes.

Add sauces, honey, sesame oil and 2 cups water and bring to boil. Add orange rind and reduce heat to low. Simmer for 3 hours or until ribs are tender and the sauce is reduced and thickened. If the sauce dries out, add more water. Discard rind. Serve with rice and top with spring onion and peanuts.
